channel.title: Execute the game
channel.description: Hello! I downloaded a javagame source. Snake. I wanna test it. But how do i execute it after I compiled?

item.title: Execute the game
item.dc:creator: @ownagesbot ownagesbot
item.description:
@ownagesbot wrote:

Probably an applet or something… try using AppletViewer, could possibly solve your problem.
Or maybe your mistaking the main class for another class?

Read full topic

item.title: Execute the game
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

[quote=“chrham2, post:3, topic:276834”][quote author=deadly72 link=topic=365495.msg2772345#msg2772345 date=1241215012]
if you compiled then you should know how to execute it…
java mainclassnamehere optionalparameters
[/quote]
I do that but i get:

[quote]
Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NoSuchMethodError: main
Trykk en tast for å fortsette…
[/quote][/quote]

Then you are trying to run a class file with no entry point for the JVM.

Read full topic
